glsa.title: OpenDKIM: Root privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability was discovered in Gentoo's ebuild for OpenDKIM which could lead to root privilege escalation.

background.p: A community effort to develop and maintain a C library for producing DKIM-aware applications and an open source milter for providing DKIM service.

description.p: It was discovered that Gentooâ€™s OpenDKIM ebuild does not properly set permissions or place the pid file in a safe directory.

impact.p: A local attacker could escalate privileges.

workaround.p: Users should ensure the proper permissions are set as discussed in the referenced bugs.
